title: Heirloom Rose-Cut Diamond and Ruby Bridal Pendant - Chandbali Inspired
features: This exquisite pendant is crafted in the style of a Chandbali, showcasing traditional Kundan setting where uncut diamonds (Polki) are meticulously set in gold. The centerpiece features two vibrant, oval-cut ruby cabochons. The pendant showcases open Polki settings and the bottom curve mimics the moon form and the Hyderabadi polish gives it an antique look.
occasions: or any special occasion where a touch of timeless elegance is desired.
description: This pendant is a rare blend of traditional South Indian jewelry craftsmanship and contemporary design. The natural rubies symbolize love and passion, while the uncut diamonds add an element of understated luxury. The heirloom-quality craftsmanship ensures that this piece can be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish and design make it a unique piece. The open Polki setting allows the diamonds to reflect light creating a unique glimmer.
